import React, { useState } from "react"; function Dashbord() { const [nomberMax,setNomberMax]=useState(0) const [score,setScore]=useState(0) const [afficher,setafficher]=useState("") const [reponse,setReponse]=useState(0) const [Message,setMessage]=useState("") const calcMultip=()=>{ let nomber1=Math.floor(Math.random()*nomberMax) let nomber2=Math.floor(Math.random()*nomberMax) setafficher(nomber1.toString() + ' X ' + nomber2.toString()); } return (

); } export default Dashbord;
